original_text: He was getting near to two villages called Bethphage and Bethany. They were on the Mount of Olives. Then Jesus sent two of his disciples to go further.
korean_text: 감람원이라 불리는 산쪽에 있는 벳바게와 베다니에 가까이 가셨을 때에 제자 중 둘을 보내시며

sentences.original_text: He was getting near to two villages
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 마을에 가까이 가고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They were on the Mount of Olives
Then Jesus sent two of his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 제자 두 사람을 보내셨다
